name: Extreme
description: XTRM Token is a crypto asset developed by Bitci Borsa Teknoloji Anonim Limited on Bitcichain. Extreme Token ("XTRM") is an innovative cryptocurrency that integrates blockchain technology with the world of extreme sports. XTRM aims to provide token holders with a wide range of Utilities for extreme sports events and activities. These Utilities can offer token holders many benefits and privileges, including event access, exclusive discounts, fan engagement, athlete sponsorship, rewards and incentives.
